home.title: I'm a Web Developer
home.description: I have of 10 years of experience building and designing software. Currently, I love to work on web application using technologies like NodeJS, NestJS, Laravel, ASP.Net Core, React, NextJS, Docker, Github and more.

about.title: Hi!, I'm Kraipon Najaroon
about.description: I have 10 years of experience building and designing software. I begin my first job on july 2010 at Nidec Copal company in software engineer and responsibility about electronic design and cartesian robot for support the production line. Currently, I love to work on web application using technologies like NodeJS, NestJS, Laravel, ASP.Net Core, React, NextJS, Docker, Github and etc.
